name: CeFi Evaluation
description: Comprehensive evaluation template for Centralized Finance platforms, focusing on trading infrastructure, risk management, compliance, and user experience
author: Shai Perednik

categories.name: Trading Systems
categories.description: Evaluation of trading system capabilities, performance, and feature set

metrics.name: Order Matching Engine
metrics.description: Quality and performance of the order matching engine

thresholds.T0: High-performance matching engine with sub-millisecond latency; capable of handling >100,000 orders per second; robust during market volatility; microservice architecture with redundancy; zero downtime upgrades
thresholds.T1: Standard matching engine with reasonable latency (<10ms); capable of handling >10,000 orders per second; stable under normal market conditions; planned maintenance windows with minimal disruption

metrics.name: Execution Quality
metrics.description: Quality and reliability of trade execution

thresholds.T0: Minimal slippage on market orders; tight spreads for major trading pairs; smart order routing for best execution; transparent fee structure; order execution logs accessible to users; verified time-stamping of orders
thresholds.T1: Reasonable slippage levels; competitive spreads for major pairs; standard fee structure; basic order history available to users

metrics.name: Trading Features & Order Types
metrics.description: Comprehensiveness of trading features and order types

thresholds.T0: Comprehensive suite of order types (market, limit, stop, OCO, trailing stop, etc.); advanced charting with multiple timeframes and indicators; trading bots and API access; conditional orders; algorithmic trading capabilities; mobile trading app with full feature parity
thresholds.T1: Standard order types (market, limit, stop); basic charting functionality; REST API access; mobile trading application with core features

metrics.name: Market Coverage & Liquidity
metrics.description: Breadth of market coverage and liquidity depth

thresholds.T0: Wide range of trading pairs covering major cryptocurrencies, altcoins, and fiat currencies; deep liquidity across all major pairs; professional market makers; minimal spread even for large orders; institutional-grade liquidity pools
thresholds.T1: Coverage of major cryptocurrencies and some altcoins; reasonable liquidity for major pairs; manageable spreads for standard order sizes

categories.name: Risk Management
categories.description: Evaluation of risk control systems and practices for position and market risk

metrics.name: Position & Exposure Monitoring
metrics.description: Quality of position monitoring and exposure management systems

thresholds.T0: Real-time position monitoring across all accounts; automated risk alerts; comprehensive dashboards for risk team; stress testing capabilities; what-if scenario analysis; customer position limits enforced automatically; cross-collateral visibility
thresholds.T1: Near real-time position tracking; basic risk alerts; standard position reporting; customer position limits in place

metrics.name: Margin & Collateral Management
metrics.description: Effectiveness of margin management and liquidation processes

thresholds.T0: Sophisticated cross-asset margin system; real-time margin calculation; tiered liquidation process with notifications; auto-deleveraging during extreme volatility; insurance fund for socialized losses; multiple collateral options; dynamic margin requirements based on market conditions
thresholds.T1: Standard isolated and cross-margin options; timely margin calculations; basic liquidation process with some user notifications; reasonable collateral options

metrics.name: Risk Limits & Controls
metrics.description: Quality of risk limit implementation and controls

thresholds.T0: Comprehensive risk limits at user, account, and platform levels; circuit breakers during extreme volatility; position and order size limits; rate limiting for API users; advanced fraud detection; multi-tier approval for large transactions; tailored limits based on user verification level
thresholds.T1: Basic risk limits in place; standard circuit breakers; order size limits; basic fraud monitoring; approval process for large withdrawals

metrics.name: Asset Security & Cold Storage
metrics.description: Quality of asset security measures and cold storage implementation

thresholds.T0: >95% of assets in cold storage; multi-signature requirements for hot wallet transactions; hardware security modules (HSMs); geographically distributed key shards; comprehensive insurance coverage; regular third-party security audits; penetration testing; air-gapped signing devices
thresholds.T1: >80% of assets in cold storage; multi-signature wallets; basic insurance coverage; periodic security audits

categories.name: Compliance & Regulatory
categories.description: Evaluation of compliance systems, regulatory adherence, and governance

metrics.name: KYC/AML Framework
metrics.description: Quality and effectiveness of KYC/AML processes

thresholds.T0: Multi-tier KYC system with AI-enhanced verification; automated AML screening; transaction monitoring with machine learning for anomaly detection; integration with global sanctions lists; risk-based approach to customer due diligence; SAR filing automation; ongoing monitoring of existing customers
thresholds.T1: Standard KYC process with identity verification; basic AML screening; transaction monitoring for suspicious activities; manual review processes; compliance with major regulations

metrics.name: Transaction Monitoring & Surveillance
metrics.description: Effectiveness of transaction monitoring and market surveillance

thresholds.T0: Real-time transaction monitoring with behavioral analytics; market surveillance for wash trading and market manipulation; chain analysis integration; automated flagging of suspicious patterns; whitelisting capabilities; granular transaction controls; source of funds verification
thresholds.T1: Standard transaction monitoring; basic market surveillance; manual review of flagged transactions; transaction limits based on verification level

metrics.name: Regulatory Reporting & Compliance
metrics.description: Quality of regulatory reporting and overall compliance posture

thresholds.T0: Automated regulatory reporting across multiple jurisdictions; dedicated compliance team with regulatory expertise; proactive engagement with regulators; regular compliance training for all staff; multiple licenses in key jurisdictions; comprehensive compliance policies; annual third-party compliance audits
thresholds.T1: Standard regulatory reporting capabilities; compliance team in place; basic staff training; required licenses obtained; documented compliance policies

metrics.name: Governance & Operational Controls
metrics.description: Quality of governance framework and operational controls

thresholds.T0: Comprehensive governance structure with independent board oversight; clear separation of duties; multiple approval levels for critical operations; detailed audit trails for all sensitive actions; regular internal audits; strong whistleblower protections; transparent corporate structure
thresholds.T1: Basic governance framework; defined roles and responsibilities; audit trails for key actions; periodic internal reviews

categories.name: Customer Experience
categories.description: Evaluation of customer service, platform usability, and educational resources

metrics.name: Support Channels & Availability
metrics.description: Quality and availability of customer support channels

thresholds.T0: 24/7 multi-channel support (live chat, email, phone); multiple language support; dedicated account managers for VIP clients; rapid response SLAs; AI-powered chat support for common issues; detailed knowledge base; tiered support system based on issue severity
thresholds.T1: Standard support hours with reasonable availability; email and ticket-based support; basic knowledge base; acceptable response times

metrics.name: Response Time & Resolution Efficiency
metrics.description: Speed and efficiency of customer support response and issue resolution

thresholds.T0: First response within minutes for critical issues; most issues resolved within 24 hours; escalation paths for complex issues; follow-up procedures; satisfaction surveys after resolution; performance metrics for support team; continuous improvement process
thresholds.T1: Reasonable first response times (within hours); most issues resolved within days; basic escalation process; standard performance tracking

metrics.name: Platform Usability & Interface
metrics.description: Quality of user interface and overall platform usability

thresholds.T0: Intuitive interface for both beginners and advanced users; customizable workspace; mobile-responsive design; dark mode; accessibility features; minimal loading times; real-time data updates; intuitive navigation; comprehensive onboarding for new users
thresholds.T1: Clean interface with reasonable usability; standard mobile support; acceptable loading times; basic onboarding for new users

metrics.name: Educational Resources & Transparency
metrics.description: Quality and completeness of educational resources and transparency in operations

thresholds.T0: Comprehensive educational content for all experience levels; trading guides and tutorials; webinars and live events; transparent fee structure; clear terms of service; proof of reserves; detailed documentation on platform operations; trading simulator for practice
thresholds.T1: Basic educational resources; standard documentation; reasonable transparency regarding fees and terms
